TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: Inicia um editor de URL que permite que um usuário selecione ou crie uma URL.

span.span: Starts a URL editor that allows a user to select or create a URL.

summary.span: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método inicia uma interface do usuário para selecionar uma URL.The method starts a user interface for selecting a URL. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o método para iniciar o construtor de uma URL de um comando de menu em tempo de design.The following code example shows how to use the method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time. [!code-cpp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CPP/urlbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CS/urlbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/VB/urlbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: Cria uma interface do usuário para criar ou selecionar uma URL.

span.span: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildUrl (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialUrl, string caption, string filter);

.method public static hidebysig string BuildUrl(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialUrl, string caption, string filter) cil managed
Public Shared Function BuildUrl (component As IComponent, owner As Control, initialUrl As String, caption As String, filter As String) As String

public: static System::String ^ BuildUrl(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ owner, System::String ^ initialUrl, System::String ^ caption, System::String ^ filter);
static member BuildUrl : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Windows.Forms.Control * string * string * string -> string

param.name: component
param.span: O cujo local deve ser usado para acessar os serviços de tempo de design.

span.span: The whose site is to be used to access design-time services.

param.name: owner
param.span: O usado como o pai para a janela do seletor.

span.span: The used as the parent for the picker window.

param.name: initialUrl
param.span: A URL inicial a ser exibida na janela do seletor.

span.span: The initial URL to be shown in the picker window.

param.name: caption
param.span: A legenda da janela do seletor.

span.span: The caption of the picker window.

param.name: filter
param.span: A cadeia de caracteres de filtro a ser usada para filtrar, opcionalmente, os arquivos exibidos na janela do seletor.

span.span: The filter string to use to optionally filter the files displayed in the picker window.

summary.span: Cria uma interface do usuário para criar ou selecionar uma URL.

span.span: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

returns.span: A URL retornada da interface do usuário.

span.span: The URL returned from the UI.

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o método para iniciar o construtor de uma URL de um comando de menu em tempo de design.The following code example shows how to use the method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time. [!code-cpp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CPP/urlbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CS/urlbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/VB/urlbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]
